description: Many people from China think that all ethnic Chinese are part of the larger Chinese family. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Sorry, but we’re Chinese Singaporeans - not your compatriots
title_page: Sorry, but we’re Chinese Singaporeans – not your compatriots | The Straits Times
maintext:
Around the middle of May, a video clip on TikTok and its Chinese sibling Douyin got people asking: Is Singapore a Chinese nation?
In the video, a Chinese tourist who had recently arrived here pointed out that he noticed Chinese Singaporeans would be unhappy when he referred to them as “compatriots”.
